title: 'X' or FEED in picks n bans - We should be able to report people in the chat lobby
body:
Riot please do something about this ... there's got to be a way to soft report someone in the chat screen in picks n bans (i'e do it enough and they get a proper report) ... so many people say it and it adds to the toxicity of the game... if i don't get my lane/role i pick another... why's it so hard for some people.
Why do i have to leave the lobby and cop LP loss and have to wait cos some brat cant learn play another lane?

> Why do i have to leave the lobby and cop LP loss and have to wait cos some brat cant learn play another lane?

well I must say I don't always get the role I want but even so I still try my best to cover the position.

I personally think that if team builder was the only option for match making in blinds it would remove this lobby conflict entirely.
although a lot of people are conflicted on that so yeah

i agree... but even just that negative bratty attitude is a problem... so many times ive seen an argument start before the game has even started... so i guess my point really is that we should have the option to soft report negative attitude in the chat lobby.. :)
Then the problem is you have to actually pick a lane before the match, a lot of people DON'T
i guess as stated above to charlie... its just the attitude i have a problem with... maybe i should change the title... the 'x' or feed is just my most hated one.. :)
Been saying this for years xD
yeh i wonder why they dont? :P
I agree it would be appropriate to have a report function in the lobby, I'd be interested to see Riots stance on this idea. Bump for red comment please.
thanks static.. im glad u agree:)
